title: Game wont Run Without frezzing every second
body:
I just started playing league after not playing it for about 3-4 weeks
I loaded into a game and the second I got in I saw my fps sitting at about 100 on high graphics
Within seconds, however, it dropped all the way down 7-20
From there one, almost every second my frame rate would constantly change
I've tried ever different set of graphics and have tried caping my frames even uninstalling and restarting my computer
Every other game on my computer seems to run fine
Also, my game will crash sometimes if I'm not in a skype call (wtf)
Any help is greatly appreciated
(Back 3 weeks ago when I was playing it ran perfectly fine at about 110 fps, also a relatively new computer got it about a month and a half ago)

replies.body: When you say crash is it a bugsplat?  If you have Windows 10, make sure the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) is disabled as it's been known to freeze games.  Run through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide as well in case there are some bad drivers here struggling to render your game and FPS.  I hope that helps!
